summary: Chat platform project with share link fixes, message ID formatting, and X post iframe width updates planned as 'Plan Y'.
known_issues: Share links use unpadded message IDs (e.g., ?messageId=2 instead of ?messageId=000000002)

existing_features.title: In the share link generation logic, zero-pad the messageId query parameter to a fixed 9-digit format (e.g., messageId=2 becomes messageId=000000002) so that share links resolve correctly.
Apply the Tailwind class `font-mono` to the inline message ID displayed inside each message bubble so that IDs render in a monospace font.
Set the max-width of the X (Twitter) post iframe embed element to 300px (currently 250px) inside the MessageBubble component.
